mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.bussiness_login_name AS "bussinessLoginName", a.bussiness_login_password AS "bussinessLoginPassword", a.company AS "company", a.phone AS "phone", a.email AS "email", a.user_name AS "userName", a.checked AS "checked", a.integral AS "integral", a.end_time AS "endTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bussiness_user( id, bussiness_login_name, bussiness_login_password, company, phone, email, user_name, checked, integral, end_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{bussinessLoginName}, #{bussinessLoginPassword}, #{company}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{userName}, #{checked}, #{integral}, #{endTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bussiness_user SET bussiness_login_name = #{bussinessLoginName}, bussiness_login_password = #{bussinessLoginPassword}, company = #{company}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, user_name = #{userName}, checked = #{checked}, integral = #{integral}, end_time = #{endTime} WHERE id = #{id}
